message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose we take a larger share upfront to account for inflation, and you get a smaller portion but with no risk.
Alice, your initial offer heavily favors you due to the inflation. I propose a more balanced split that recognizes the decreasing value of the money over time.
Bob, your offer significantly undervalues my position in the early rounds.  I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but this split recognizes the time pressure we both face.
